name: Lost Contact (DrSkort)
description:
Lost Contact

Imagine receiving an SOS Signal from deep below. Would you try and find out who send it or try to ignore it?

In this game the captain of our submarine decides to give his best and rescue whoever might be stranded down there.

Features:

- Awesome Submarine Mechanics

- An Amazing Splash Soundeffect (made with a tissue)

- 3 Different Zones To Explore

- and most importantly a lot of Treasures!!!

Controls:

- You control in which direction the submarine should swim by pressing the left mouse button

- You interact with your environment and continue the dialog by pressing E on your keyboard

- To collect treasure you just swim into it

Known Bugs :(

I will try to list all known bugs here. If you encounter any bugs, it would be pretty awesome of you to post them in the comments :)

- You keep your momentum when splashing into the water and can use it immediately to change your direction, which feels kinda off

- when entering the shop or entering a dialog the submarine keeps spinning
